fields.Title: THOUGHT / KINGDOM OF CONSCIENCE
fields.Description: Empathy informs you that you are a Moralist. Kingdom of Conscience awaits.

fields.Title: START
input
Empathy: "*Tsk, tsk*. Just because you live i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Tsk, tsk*. Just because you live in the *present* doesn't mean you have the right to place your needs above the needs of the *future*...

fields.Title: Empathy: "*Incrementally*."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Incrementally*.

fields.Title: Composure: "What sangfroid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What sangfroid...

fields.Title: Empathy: "The Kingdom is difficult to compreh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Kingdom is difficult to comprehend and even more difficult to describe...

fields.Title: Empathy: "Of course, a *radical centrist*. In..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, a *radical centrist*. In these bright and loud times where a thousand frequencies drown one another out, sober thinking is a radical act...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Speaking of, when are you going to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Speaking of, when are you going to get on that, bub?

fields.Title: You: "How do you bring about those *circu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How do you bring about those *circumstances*?

fields.Title: Empathy: "Do you believe the status quo is pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do you believe the status quo is preferable to chaos and bloodshed?

fields.Title: Empathy: "The air suddenly feels calmer. More..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The air suddenly feels calmer. More transparent in a strangely tender way. Perhaps it's the hangover, perhaps it's a temporary surge of serotonin, but something tells you...

fields.Title: Empathy: "Is it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it?

fields.Title: You: "You must be mistaken: I'm a real ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You must be mistaken: I'm a real radical.

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Variable["apt.sunday_electrochem_kingdom_speed"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_cancelled"] == false
Variable["apt.sunday_electrochem_kingdom_speed"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_cancelled"] == false

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["apt.sunday_electrochem_kingdom_speed"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_cancelled"] == false

fields.Title: !(Variable["apt.sunday_electrochem_kingdom_speed"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_cancelled"] == false)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["apt.sunday_electrochem_kingdom_speed"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_cancelled"] == false) == false

fields.Title: Empathy: "What's this? We're getting reports..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's this? We're getting reports of *normal*, *reasonable*, *temperate* political opinions somewhere in Martinaise...

fields.Title: Empathy: "There you have it. Sometimes holdin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There you have it. Sometimes holding the line *is* progress.

fields.Title: You: "That's a stupid goal. (Shake your h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's a stupid goal. (Shake your head dismissively.)

fields.Title: You: "No, I'm too fiery for this watercol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, I'm too fiery for this watercolour ideology. I'm trying to develop more *extreme* and *interesting* opinions... (Opt out.)

fields.Title: You: "No."
fields.Dialogue Text: No.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "What a fucking joke!"
fields.Dialogue Text: What a fucking joke!

fields.Title: Volition: "What benevolence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What benevolence...

fields.Title: You: "Sounds incredible. Allons-y! Let's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds incredible. Allons-y! Let's go there right now. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's time... to become a citizen of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time... to become a citizen of the *Kingdom of Conscience*.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Must have been a false alarm, then."
fields.Dialogue Text: Must have been a false alarm, then.

fields.Title: Empathy: "That's right. Remember -- *real dem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right. Remember -- *real democracy* is just around the corner for Revachol. When that real democracy kicks in -- a long time from now -- we are all going to be so much happier.

fields.Title: You: "This is because I keep saying *none..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is because I keep saying *none of the above* to political stuff, isn't it?"

fields.Title: You: "First, where is this Kingdom of Con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: First, where is this Kingdom of Conscience?

fields.Title: You: "No more talk -- Sign me up for a pa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No more talk -- Sign me up for a passport! (Opt in.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "You may never live to see the Kingd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You may never live to see the Kingdom of Conscience. Your children may not. Even your *grandchildren* might not. But that's no excuse not to keep working...

fields.Title: Empathy: "That's the genius of *Dolores Dei*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's the genius of *Dolores Dei*. She recognized that progress is meaningless if its gains are lost because of instability. *Real*, lasting change can only come about gradually. Increment by increment.

fields.Title: You: "That's me, Mr. Reasonable. Someone'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's me, Mr. Reasonable. Someone's got to keep it sane around here.

fields.Title: Empathy: "That's a pity. *Real democracy* was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's a pity. *Real democracy* was just around the corner for Revachol. All the leading citizens are waiting there -- without you.

fields.Title: You: "Oh, right. Then let's get there......"
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, right. Then let's get there... eventually?

fields.Title: Empathy: "History's greatest catastrophes hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: History's greatest catastrophes have been brought about by people trying to make the world a better place *too quickly*...

fields.Title: You: "Man, that sounds kind of terrible...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Man, that sounds kind of terrible. I don't think I want to be a moralist anymore. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: You: "Wait, is the Kingdom of Conscience..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, is the Kingdom of Conscience really about doing things, or just preserving the status quo?

fields.Title: You: "That seems fine. I still want to li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That seems fine. I still want to live for the present, though. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "Sometimes, in the face of great dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sometimes, in the face of great disaster, defending the status quo *is* progress.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It is, isn't it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: It is, isn't it?

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's also post-industrial, post-ide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's also post-industrial, post-ideological, and even *post-sexual*.

fields.Title: You: "But what about all the things that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But what about all the things that are wrong *now*?

fields.Title: Empathy: "What you *want* is immaterial. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What you *want* is immaterial. The Kingdom of Conscience is coming... WHETHER YOU LIKE IT OR NOT. (Only very slowly.)

fields.Title: You: "This sounds mega boring. Count me o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This sounds mega boring. Count me out. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "Slow down, Mr. Reasonable! Did you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Slow down, Mr. Reasonable! Did you miss the part about compromising and taking things slow?

fields.Title: Empathy: "It is not a place, it is a *moment*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is not a place, it is a *moment* in time that can only arise in the right circumstances. In all of human history, it's only been achieved a handful of times...

fields.Title: Empathy: "I knew we could trust you. Remember..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I knew we could trust you. Remember -- *real democracy* is just around the corner for Revachol. When that real democracy kicks in we are all going to be so much happier.

fields.Title: yourmoralistoption
You: "Yes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Then you've never lived through *re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Then you've never lived through *real* chaos...

fields.Title: You: "That's an honourable goal. (Nod you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's an honourable goal. (Nod your head approvingly.)

fields.Title: You: "Okay, but what's the Kingdom of Con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, but what's the Kingdom of Conscience actually *like*?

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's *also* about that. But it's *a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *also* about that. But it's *also* more! Perhaps it's the hangover, perhaps it's a temporary surge of serotonin, but something tells you...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "YAWN. You'd get there faster with a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: YAWN. You'd get there faster with a little *speed*.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Partly because humanity will need t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Partly because humanity will need to discard many of the categories that define and limit it today. The Kingdom of Conscience is post-capitalist, post-national...

fields.Title: Logic: "What rationality..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What rationality...
